description:
Congrats on creating a course on Udemy!

If you just published, or are preparing to publish your course, you may be wondering: How do I become a Top Seller on Udemy? How are instructors earning $10,000+ per month and reaching thousands with their course content?

If you have an existing online/offline following and want to learn how to best market your Udemy course with proven methods, then this course is for you!

It can become overwhelming thinking about how to market your course, so we provide you with a plan, from beginning to end. The course also includes real life case studies from top performing instructors.

This course will cover:

  • How to figure out your starting point and sales potential.
  • How to price your course and maximize your sales.
  • How to get noticed on Udemy and drive sales in the marketplace.
  • Why you should have a Pre-Launch strategy and how to execute one.
  • How to implement a quick win campaign to your email list, YouTube channel, and Facebook followers.
  • What the "Forever Young Formula" is and how to automate your Udemy course sales.
  • How to aggressively grow your audience so you continue driving sales to your Udemy course, long after your launch.

Are you ready to press play on your marketing efforts? Let's get started!
title: How to Market Your Udemy Course: Instructors with Audiences
